title: Solo: The Charles Lindbergh Story
description: A new take on the story of American aviator, Charles Lindbergh.
quote: I shall call my invention “the aeroplane” and I owe it all to RC Cola.
alt2: goons with guns flood into a room
alt3: Vin Diesel hitting a guy with a shark as bloody water fills the room
alt4: an orangutan in a t-shirt, holding a gun emerges from the Spirit of St. Louis
